data.title: What Languages Do They Speak Where?
data.meta_description: Do you know what the most common languages spoken in each country are? Here you can find out what languages are commonly spoken where.
data.text:
Do you know what the most common languages spoken in each country are? Many countries have more than one language spoken within their borders. And people in some countries speak more than one language.

Here you can find out what languages are commonly spoken where.

Afghanistan

Dari, Pashto

Albania

Albanian

Algeria

Arabic, French, Berber

Angola

Portuguese, Umbundu, Kikongo, Kimbundu, Chokwe
